effect.name: Normalize RGB video
effect.description: Normalize RGB video (aka histogram stretching, contrast stretching)
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.blackpt
Output darkest input color
parameter.comment: Output color to which darkest input color is mapped (default black)

parameter.name: av.whitept
Output brightest input color
parameter.comment: Output color to which brightest input color is mapped (default white)

parameter.name: av.smoothing
Smoothing
parameter.comment: Amount of temporal smoothing of the input range, to reduce flicker (default 0)

parameter.name: av.independence
Independence
parameter.comment: Proportion of independent to linked channel normalization (default 1)

parameter.name: av.strength
Strength
parameter.comment: Strength of filter, from no effect (0) to full normalization (default 1)
